about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Junior FullStack Developer and Computer Science student, with experience working in startups and early-stage products. I started my career as a Frontend Developer and evolved into a FullStack role, building both client-side and server-side applications.
about.paragraph2: Currently involved in a vesting-based product as CPO, leading Frontend and UX/UI while actively contributing to the backend using Node.js and PostgreSQL. I am self-taught, analytical, and focused on delivering real value from day one.
